Package com.poloniex.api.client.rest

Interface PoloPublicApiService

  • public interface PoloPublicApiService
    PoloPublicApiService interface defines the API to communicate with the Poloniex exchange server.

    Instances of PoloPublicApiService are generated using Retrofit. The generated object will connect to Poloniex's public REST endpoints.

    Use PoloApiServiceGenerator to build PoloPublicApiService object

      • getMarkets

        @GET("/markets/")
retrofit2.Call<List<Market>> getMarkets()
        Symbol Information: get all symbols and their tradeLimit info
        Returns:
        list of markets

      • getMarket

retrofit2.Call<List<Market>> getMarket​(@Path("symbol")
                                       String symbol)
        Symbol Information by Id: get symbol and tradeLimit info by Id
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getCurrencies

        @GET("/currencies/")
retrofit2.Call<List<Map<String,​Currency>>> getCurrencies()
        Currency Information: get all supported currencies
        Returns:
        list of currencies

      • getCurrencies

        @GET("/currencies/")
retrofit2.Call<List<Map<String,​Currency>>> getCurrencies​(@Query("includeMultiChainCurrencies")
                                                               Boolean includeMultiChainCurrencies)
        Currency Information: get all supported currencies
        Parameters:
        includeMultiChainCurrencies - Default is false. Indicates if multi chain currencies are included. If set to true, additionally adds a new row for each currency on their respective chain (i.e USDT, USDTETH, USDTTRON will all have entries).
        Returns:
        list of currencies

      • getCurrency

        @GET("/currencies/{currency}")
retrofit2.Call<Map<String,​Currency>> getCurrency​(@Path("currency")
                                                       String currency,
                                                       @Query("includeMultiChainCurrencies")
                                                       Boolean includeMultiChainCurrencies)
        Currency Information: get currency
        Parameters:
        currency - currency name
        includeMultiChainCurrencies - Default is false. Indicates if multi chain currencies are included. If set to true, additionally adds a new row for each currency on their respective chain (i.e USDT, USDTETH, USDTTRON will all have entries).
        Returns:
        currency info

retrofit2.Call<Timestamp> getTimestamp()

        Returns:
        server timestamp

      • getOrderBook

        @GET("/markets/{symbol}/orderBook")
retrofit2.Call<OrderBook> getOrderBook​(@Path("symbol")
                                       String symbol,
                                       @Query("scale")
                                       String scale,
                                       @Query("limit")
                                       Integer limit)
        Order Book: Get the order book for a given symbol
        Parameters:
        symbol - symbol name
        scale - controls aggregation by price
        limit - maximum number of records returned. The default value of limit is 10. Valid limit values are: 5, 10, 20, 50, 100, 150.
        Returns:
        order book

      • getCandles

        @GET("/markets/{symbol}/candles")
retrofit2.Call<List<List<String>>> getCandles​(@Path("symbol")
                                              String symbol,
                                              @Query("interval")
                                              String interval,
                                              @Query("limit")
                                              Integer limit,
                                              @Query("startTime")
                                              Long startTime,
                                              @Query("endTime")
                                              Long endTime)
        Candles: Returns OHLC for a symbol at given timeframe (interval).
        Parameters:
        symbol - symbol name
        interval - the unit of time to aggregate data by. Valid values: MINUTE_1, MINUTE_5, MINUTE_10, MINUTE_15, MINUTE_30, HOUR_1, HOUR_2, HOUR_4, HOUR_6, HOUR_12, DAY_1, DAY_3, WEEK_1 and MONTH_1
        limit - maximum number of records returned. The default value is 100 and the max value is 500.
        startTime - filters by time. The default value is 0.
        endTime - filters by time. The default value is current time
        Returns:
        a list of candles

      • getMarketTrades

        @GET("/markets/{symbol}/trades")
retrofit2.Call<List<MarketTrade>> getMarketTrades​(@Path("symbol")
                                                  String symbol,
                                                  @Query("limit")
                                                  Integer limit)
        Trades: Returns a list of recent trades, request param limit is optional, its default value is 500, and max value is 1000.
        Parameters:
        symbol - symbol name
        limit - maximum number of records returned
        Returns:
        list of trades
